content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

--Querying data from Delta files
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    Bulk 'trip_data_green_delta',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
)
AS trip_data

--Getting the data types for each column
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    Bulk ''trip_data_green_delta'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''calendar_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
)
AS trip_data'
